formElement.label: Credentials to be entered:
formElement.documentation: The credentials needed to check the status of the page.

formElement.label: Target URL:
formElement.documentation: URL of the page to be checked.

formElement.label: Maximum Elapsed Time:
formElement.documentation: Defines the maximum time in seconds that the job will try to check into the server. Blank implies no wait time (URL only checked one time).

formElement.label: Success Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Indicates the expected correct result to be obtained when running checking the server.
